alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Santa Rosa and central Escambia Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1250 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Pace, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Bagdad, Pea Ridge, Roeville, Floridatown and Point Baker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
